com.ibm.eventstreams.serdes

Class EventStreamsSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.eventstreams.serdes.EventStreamsSerializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, org.apache.kafka.common.serialization.Serializer<org.apache.avro.generic.IndexedRecord>

    public class EventStreamsSerializer
extends Object
implements org.apache.kafka.common.serialization.Serializer<org.apache.avro.generic.IndexedRecord>
    The Event Streams serializer used by Kafka to convert generic or specific IndexedRecord objects to bytes, using schemas retrieved from the schema registry.
